description:
Chihaya drops by Toko`s apartment unannounce to spend time together when a surprised Ichimiya returns home to see his girlfriend and sister playing games.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Contenez-vous. Les murs ont des oreilles
Jiko Boushi Mienai Tokoro ni Hito ga Iru
Self Prevention, There Are People Where You Can`t See
自己防止 見えない所に 人が居る
